casebody.data:
No. 10-6520. Ernest Brim, aka Bernard Horne, Petitioner v. Aristedes W. Zavares, Executive Director, Colorado Department of Corrections, et al. 562 U.S. 1174, 131 S. Ct. 990,

178 L. Ed. 2d 819,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 511. January 10, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 1015, 131 S. Ct. 533, 178 L. Ed. 2d 392, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8565.
